title: Kha is OP
body: if champ is fed every single game, in my or in enemy team, doesn't matter it MEANS that is not about me, that is not about my team, that is not about enemy fucking team, IT'S ABOUT FUCKING CHAMP, THAT IS BROKEN, BROOOOOOOOOOOOKEN. everyone knows that. tired of NB3 propaganda since he stoppped being OP in season 4

replies.body:
You know who's better than Kha Six? Fiddlesticks :D Watch this hilarious game!

https://youtu.be/RtHwjLlYUiU
But he isn't I can't remember the last time I saw a fed kha that wasn't in my premade.
